solution_line_template: For {servings_needed} servings, Thomas needs {servings_needed}*{cups_per_serving} = <<{servings_needed}*{cups_per_serving}={total_cups}>>{total_cups} cups of chickpeas.
To have {total_cups} cups, Thomas needs {total_cups}*{ounces_per_cup} = <<{total_cups}*{ounces_per_cup}={total_ounces}>>{total_ounces} ounces.
Since Thomas cannot buy half a can, he needs to buy {answer} cans.
